nodes.bodyText: (off-topic): Does this code work in tr-TR?

I've no clue what "tr-Tr" means.
Since it's off-topic, I guess I don't have to explain why I believe the code does the same thing before and after this commit

It's not a problem with the code change in the PR, just flagging a potential issue that already exists in the code that this shone light on.
tr-TR is shorthand for the Turkish language. https://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/langcodes_name.php?iso_639_1=tr
In Turkey, they have both a dotted and dotless "I:

If element.attr("service") == ANDROID, then it may not work correctly.
Spoke too soon. Seems fine as it uses character comparison rather than String comparison, Sorry!
